item.title: Multiline YAML: Understanding and testing complex strings
item.description: Explore YAML options for effectively handling multiline strings, with an interactive demo that allows you to test them in real-time.
item.dc:creator: Pablo Caro

item.title: `direnv`: Manage your development environments intelligently
item.description: Discover direnv, a shell extension that automatically loads and unloads environment variables when changing directories, keeping your configuration clean and organized.
item.dc:creator: Pablo Caro

item.title: Reduce Noise in Your Python Logs: A Smart Approach
item.description: Learn how to configure Python's logging module to avoid message overload from third-party libraries, keeping your logs clean and useful.
item.dc:creator: Pablo Caro

item.title: Powerful Command Line Tools for Developers
item.description: Collection of essential command line tools for developers: curl, ngrep, netcat, sshuttle, siege, and mitmproxy
item.dc:creator: Pablo Caro
